summary.para: Visualizes data as bars, areas, lines and other shapes. See Chart Control.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SaveToFile(System.String)

summary.para: Saves the chart's layout to the specified file.

member.param: A value, which specifies the path to the file where the layout should be stored. If an empty string is specified, an exception is raised.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SaveToStream(System.IO.Stream)

summary.para: Saves the chart's layout to the specified stream.

member.param: A descendant to which the chart's layout is written.

summary.para: Occurs when an end-user scrolls the ChartControl.
Occurs when an end-user scrolls the 3D diagram.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SelectedItems

summary.para: Gets the collection of selected items (chart points and series) and business data objects (in the case of using a data source) of the ChartControl object.

member.value: A list which contains selected chart points, series and business data objects (in the case of using a data source).

summary.para: Occurs after the selection of a chart item has been changed.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SelectionMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a value which specifies how the chart elements are selected.

member.value: An enumeration member specifying the chart's selection behavior.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.Series

summary.para: Provides access to the chart control's collection of series objects.

member.value: A object that represents the collection of series.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SeriesDataMember

summary.para: Gets or sets the name of the data field that contains names for automatically generated series.

member.value: A value that specifies the data field's name.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SeriesNameTemplate

summary.para: Gets the settings used to name data bound series.

member.value: A object that contains naming settings.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SeriesSelectionMode

summary.para: Gets or sets a value specifying how the series is selected in the chart control.

member.value: A enumeration member specifying the selection behavior of a series.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SeriesSerializable

summary.para: Gets or sets the value used to support serialization of the property.

member.value: An array of objects.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SeriesSorting

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies how series are sorted within the chart control based upon the series names.

member.value: A enumeration value.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SeriesTemplate

summary.para: Gets the template settings for bound series.

member.value: A object that contains the template settings for bound series.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SetObjectSelection(System.Object)

summary.para: Selects the specified chart element at runtime.

member.param: A which specifies the chart element to select.

summary.para: Invokes the Print Preview Form, which shows the print preview of the chart.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.ShowPrintPreview(DevExpress.XtraCharts.Printing.PrintSizeMode)

summary.para: Invokes the Print Preview Form, which shows the print preview of the chart using the specified zoom settings.

member.param: A enumeration value which specifies the size mode used to print the chart.

summary.para: Invokes the Ribbon Print Preview Form, which shows the print preview of the chart.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SideBySideBarDistanceFixed

summary.para: Gets or sets the fixed distance value between bars in all side-by-side series views (2D Side-by-Side Bar, Side-by-Side Range Bar, Side-by-Side Gantt and 3D Side-by-Side Bar) of this chart.

member.value: An integer value which represents the fixed distance between bars, measured in pixels.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SideBySideBarDistanceVariable

summary.para: Gets or sets the variable distance value between bars in all side-by-side series views (2D Side-by-Side Bar, Side-by-Side Range Bar, Side-by-Side Gantt and 3D Side-by-Side Bar) of this chart.

member.value: A value which represents the variable bar distance between bars, measured in fractions of axis units.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SideBySideEqualBarWidth

summary.para: Gets or sets a value indicating whether all bars of a series should have equal width in all side-by-side series views (2D Side-by-Side Bar, Side-by-Side Range Bar, Side-by-Side Gantt and 3D Side-by-Side Bar) of this chart.

member.value: true if all bars of the same series should always have equal width; otherwise, false.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.SmallChartText

summary.para: Gets the settings for the text to be displayed in the chart control, when it's too small to fit the diagram.

member.value: A object, representing the small chart text options.

summary.para: Occurs when the control size does not allow displaying a readable chart.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.StackedStepAreaInvertedStep

summary.para: Gets or sets the value indicating whether or not Stacked Step areas are plotted using inverted step.

member.value: true if series should be plotted using inverted step; otherwise false

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.Tag

summary.para: Overrides the property.

member.value: A value. Always returns null (Nothing in Visual Basic).

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.Text

summary.para: Overrides the property.

member.value: A value. Always returns .

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.Titles

summary.para: Gets the collection of chart titles.

member.value: A object that represents the collection of chart titles.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.ToolTipController

summary.para: Specifies the tooltip controller component that controls the appearance, position and other settings of tooltips displayed for the Chart control.

member.value: A object.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.ToolTipEnabled

summary.para: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether or not a tooltip is enabled for a chart.

member.value: Default - a tooltip's state (enabled/disabled) is automatically determined according to the type of a diagram currently displayed on a chart; True - a tooltip is enabled in a chart; False - a tooltip is disabled.

member.name: P:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.ToolTipOptions

summary.para: Gets the tooltip settings allowing you to specify its position and appearance on a diagram.

member.value: A object descendant which represents tooltip options on a diagram.

member.name: M:DevExpress.XtraCharts.ChartControl.UnregisterSummaryFunction(System.String)

summary.para: Unregisters the summary function with the specified name.

member.param: A value representing the name of the summary function to be unregistered.

summary.para: Occurs when an end-user zooms in or out of the ChartControl.
Occurs when an end-user zooms in or out of the 3D diagram.
